description: The PRO version is well worth it for $19.99 a year. Wavebox has sandbox options for each web app installed. It runs very fast on my Kubuntu 19.04 setup. If using a password manager plugin, this allows for easy integration with apps.
summary: Happy user for over a year now

description: Aggregates every login in one place. Fast, updated frequently and the devs talk on github issues when logged.

The program works on Ubuntu but it's NOT free!
Only the fact that states its [Free] is disturbing.. Of course in today's world where marketing rules (unfortunately) everything is possible!
It's a 15 days trial and needs $48 per year ($4 monthly)...
I just hate surprises!!
To use this "program" I better navigate through chromium or firefox in O365, it is in very bad taste to do this and still charge for that.
summary: It is a browser, not a client!

description: Not FREE as described, only trial version

Another "give us money forever" app that labels itself as "Free" (look right beside 'License') when it's not. How the Linux community allows a word that it has revered since it's inception to be maligned and distorted like this confounds me. And like every "give me money" app there are a trillion places where you can hand them your credit card number. Finding out what you get for your $4/month is a lot harder.

One word: Crooked.

Uninstalled.

Promises to bring all your accounts together. In reality it only brings one service for one account, and after that it's £50/year not the $20/year seen in other reviews.

Is it worth it? Unless I had ten or more accounts to manage that had a financial impact, no. If I did, probably.

Nice app, but not everyone can buy a pro version. The basic version is so mean with little function. Just as it want to present, if you are a poor guy, so this is not your app. So I quit, haha, as I am poor guy, that's why I choose Ubuntu. Lolol...
summary: nice functions but it is so obvious to make money

description:
, its a browser leads you to other services and takes permissions to read your emails and files, very intrusively and without any clear privacy descriptions... They not only asked for money for doing that! but they wanted access to my emails, files and contacts and god knows what else too!! This app seems more harmful than any good its doing...

Use web versions of your apps instead of this...

Wanted to use the app but when I clicked the sign in with Google account button nothing happened. I see that there is another window that opened but I can't bring it to focus and take any actions on it, the sign in window appears to be too small. Didn't want the hassle so I just uninstalled it
To developers: DO you guys not use Sublime, Atom, or have you forgotten Linux, atleast have some shame and release Community Editon like Rambox does or lets forget you even exist.
summary: So much of Open Source! but so less of your support

description:
This comment is not in defence of Wavebox or against it. This is just to clarify on uniformed comments on this page.
Some comments in the reviews talk about the software claiming to be free but you have to pay fees for it. This is a confusion between Software licence and usage fees.
Free licence is free as in Freedom not free as in a free dinner.
A free licence gives users such rights as being able to copy the software, share it, makes changes etc. It does not refer to the cost of using it.
You can click on the licence type, there should be a link to the licence that explains what it is. Having said this, most software with free licences are also priced at zero for usage, such software are short term developments such as by students, volunteers etc. or in long term depend on donation and support funds, while some services do charge money for the service they provide.
summary: About comments on not being free

description: Plans could be a little bit cheaper.

Bei der Installation wird nicht auf Kosten hingewiesen ich wollte lediglich etwas schneller auf meine E-Mails zugreifen aber dafür 50€ zu bezahlen um mir einen Maus-Click zu ersparen dann öffne ich doch lieber den Browser ohne ausgabe meiner privaten Daten an dritte
Es bastante eficiente, cumple con su proposito
очень удобно все в одном месте!
Пока очень удобно, подвязал сюда почты, чтоб по браузеру их не искать + уведомления с них приходят. На бесплатном тарифе можно подвязать два акка, дальше за денюжку.
